Title: Cheshmane John Malkovich 1: Viggo Mortensen
Actors: Viggo Mortensen, Parastoo Mohajer, Mahdis Azizpour, Nadia Keyvani
Plot: This movie is based on the Trilogy Novel called "Cheshmane John Malkovich" (John Malkovich's Eyes). It has 3 episodes namely "Kamin" (Ambush), "Sayeha Bidarand" (The Shadows are Awake) and "Cheshmane John Malkovich" (John Malkovich's Eyes.
